definitions: in a way that can change so as to adapt to different circumstances

examples.text: the ability of governments to respond flexibly to changing economic circumstances
most women who have children want to work flexibly

shortDefinitions: in way that can change so as to adapt to different circumstances

definitions: in a way that bends easily without breaking

examples.text: the robot can move flexibly and smoothly over uneven surfaces

shortDefinitions: in way that bends easily without breaking
